newsitem.title: SPAIN: GOLF-HARRINGTON HITS HOLE-IN-ONE AT MASTERS.
newsitem.headline: GOLF-HARRINGTON HITS HOLE-IN-ONE AT MASTERS.

text.p: Ireland's Padraig Harrington shot a hole-in-one in the first round of the Volvo Masters on Thursday.
The Dubliner, a Walker Cup player in 1995 and winner of the Spanish Open in May, used a seven-iron on the 173-yard third hole.

Harrington is a candidate for the European rookie of the year award. His main rivals are Scot Raymond Russell, who won the Cannes Open in April, and Thomas Bjorn of Denmark, winner of the Loch Lomond Invitational last month.
